content: 1 bright sparks hat © elizabeth nihoniho 2020 2 about bright sparks hat bright sparks is a hat that speaks of life-giving fire it speaks of energy and the sustaining of life it speaks of hope and a future the little faux cables represent sparks shooting up life is only possible with fire we need it to heat and eat because of fire we live and therefore have hope and a future that is filled with many more bright sparks the hat is cast on and a short rib hem is worked before moving into the faux cable and rib pattern a short rib pattern section is followed by decreases at the top of the hat a pom-pom can be added and your little bright sparks hat is ready this is the perfect quick project a lovely gift knit or for using up bigger amounts of leftovers with the rib texture it fits lots of different heads from children to adults you can even eliminate the pattern and work just the k3 p2 rib up the hat for a simpler version bright sparks hat specifications finished measurements
